channel.title: NSE:BJFIN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NSE:BJFIN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: India’s Long Bonds Are a Buy on Wider Spreads, Bajaj’s Iyer Says
item.description: India’s long-tenor sovereign bonds present a buying opportunity, thanks to a wide yield spread over shorter notes, according to a top official at Bajaj Finserv Ltd.
